long_description: When you take on the challenge of triathlon, make sure your gear is as tough as you. With a snug fit and performance fabric, the TYR Competitor Tri Singlet is ready to go the distance. Stretchy polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture away from skin; built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Compression fit lets fabric surround and support muscles, reducing muscle fatigue. Deep 10 in. front zipper provides immediate ventilation; elastic rear pocket stores energy gels or other small race day essentials. Flatlock seams on the TYR Competitor Tri Singlet reduce chafing and irritation.
short_description: When you take on the challenge of triathlon, make sure your gear is as tough as you. With a snug fit and performance fabric, the TYR Competitor Tri Singlet is ready to go the distance.
